fraud_indicators: Mixed Indian and foreign identification found

high_risk_pii.description: Document contains highly sensitive financial or identity information

patterns.description: Document contains urgent action language often used in scams
Document contains legal threats or intimidation
Document mentions personal emergencies often used in scams

suspicious_patterns.description: Document contains language patterns commonly found in fraudulent communications

combinations.description: Document contains both Indian and foreign identification which is unusual

unusual_combinations.description: Document contains unusual combinations of sensitive information

claim, if any.
